entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Sainte-Agathe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:10 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Jovite 2:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
